titleStmt.title: The case of compulsion in matters of religion stated by G.B. ; addressed to the serious consideration of the members of the Church of England, in this present juncture.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Burnet.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
